title: Learner-Trait-Based Simulation/VR Instructional Model for Online Language Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience or beginner-level foreign language comprehension
context.additional_context: Enhanced visual/mental activities tailored to learner characteristics and integrated design across the four language domains (listening, speaking, reading, writing)

learning_goals: Learners can perform language application skills in real-world scenarios with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations
Individual visual/cognitive learning style patterns can be analyzed through surveys and structural equation modeling
The effectiveness of learner-trait-based design models can be demonstrated in project-based assessments integrating the four language domains
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
